surah meaning: The outer walls of a city
surah 1 ayah 1 meaning: All praise and thanks is for Allah The Master of all nations and people
surah 1 ayah 2 meaning: The extremely loving the always loving
surah 1 ayah 3 meaning: The Master of the Day of Judgment
surah 1 ayah 4 meaning: You alone we worship and You alone we ask for help
surah 1 ayah 5 meaning: Guide us to the upright stright path
surah 1 ayah 6 meaning: The path of those upon whom You have favored
surah 1 ayah 7 meaning: But not of those who have wrath upon and not those who are lost
surah 2 ayah 1 meaning: No one knows the meaning of Alif Laam Meem, only Allah knows its meaning
surah 2 ayah 2: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبُ لَا رَيْبَ ۛ فِيهِ ۛ هُدًۭى لِّلْمُتَّقِينَ
surah 2 ayah 2 meaning: That is the book! No doubt! In it is an amazing guidance for the cautious
surah 2 ayah 3: ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْغَيْبِ وَيُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقْنَـٰهُمْ يُنفِقُونَ
surah 2 ayah 3 meaning: Those who believe in the unseen, establish the salah, and only out of what We have provided them, they spend
surah 2 ayah 4: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِمَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكَ وَمَآ أُنزِلَ مِن قَبْلِكَ وَبِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ هُمْ يُوقِنُونَ
surah 2 ayah 4 meaning: And those who believe in whatever is sent to you and whatever is sent from much before you and in the afterlife they are convinced
surah 2 ayah 5: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ عَلَىٰ هُدًۭى مِّن رَّبِّهِمْ ۖ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ
surah 2 ayah 5 meaning: Those people are committed to guidance from their Master and those people are the reapers of success
surah 2 ayah 6: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَأَنذَرْتَهُمْ أَمْ لَمْ تُنذِرْهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
surah 2 ayah 6 meaning: Certainly those who disbelieve it is the same for them whether you warn them or do not warn them they will not believe
surah 2 ayah 7: خَتَمَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمْ وَعَلَىٰ سَمْعِهِمْ ۖ وَعَلَىٰٓ أَبْصَـٰرِهِمْ غِشَـٰوَةٌۭ ۖ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌۭ
surah 2 ayah 7 meaning: Allah has completely sealed their hearts and their hearing and even over their eyes is a covering and for them is a great punishment
